<?php
$id = $_GET['id'];
$_SESSION['id'] = $id;

function complex($re, $str) {
    return preg_replace(
        '/(' . $re . ')/ei',
        'strtolower("\\1")',
        $str
    );
}


foreach($_GET as $re => $str) {
    echo complex($re, $str). "\n";
}

function getFlag(){
    @eval($_GET['cmd']);
}
